attributes.action: To remove the Always Badge from Arden park primary school
attributes.additional_details: So this badge is for those who are ( Always) good!! so u have to be good for a certain amount of days then u will receive ur (Always badge) in one instance a child received his badge but then got it took of him for sharing his crisp (really) also children stating they are not “normal” because they don’t have this badge and mothers not allowing their child to play with a none ( Always ) child. They say it’s wrong to treat 2 Children different well is this not thier way of doin so i.e laberling them.
attributes.background:
Over the last 11 years this always badge which is suppose to be a privilege seems to be causing more problems for pupils and parents. 
It has now come to the stage where this has become a massive problem which has made it very apparent that it doesn’t actual benefit anyone.

rejection.details: You could raise this issue with the school's senior management or governing body.
